DOC.brief_summary: Investigation of the incidence of endocrine dysfunction following subarachnoid hemorrhage (SAH), and to see if this has a relation to CNS lesions as evaluated by MRI and to common symptoms after SAH such as general exhaustion, lack of initiative, increased sleep demand and reduced quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: Endocrine Dysfunction and Quality of Life After Subarachnoid Hemorrhage
DOC.criteria: acute aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage unable to give informed consent
